name: Nazi Slam
description:
Our 4-week creation for Nazi Slam Jam.

While missing much of what we would have liked, it's a pretty impressive product for the time involved.

An Xinput gamepad (X360) is highly recommended and will be auto-detected by default. This can be turned off in the options if you wish to use keyboard/mouse or remappable DirectInput.

X = Light Attack
Y = Heavy Attack
B = Charge/Special Attack
A = Dodge
Start = Pause
L stick for movement
R Stick for camera

Mac & Linux builds are untested and provided as-is.
